全身麻醉药（general anaesthetics）是一类能抑制中枢神经系统功能的药物，使意识、感觉和反射暂时消失，骨骼肌松弛，主要用于 …

entry.def: When a doctor or other trained person anaesthetizes a patient, they make the patient unconscious or unable to feel pain by giving them an anaesthetic.
If something such as a drug anaesthetizes part or all of your body, it makes you unable to feel anything in that part of your body.

example.ex: Alcohol is a potent drug that anaesthetizes the brain.
example.tran: 酒精是一种能麻醉大脑的烈性药物。

means.word_mean: 1. make unconscious by means of anesthetic drugs;

sentences.sentence: "The patient must be anesthetized before the operation"
